title: Sunaroma Goat's Milk W/ Shea Butter & Manuka Honey Soap (8 Ounce)
features: Soft, Supple Skin: Rich in fatty acids and triglycerides, our naturally-derived Goat's Milk soap is easily absorbed into your skin for a soft-to-the-touch complexion! It also provides gentle exfoliation, removing dead cells to promote a smooth and undeniably radiant glow

Lock in Moisture: Teeming with skin-friendly acids and Vitamins A and E, Shea Butter is a great go-to for hydration! Our Goat's Milk soap benefits the complexion by boosting collagen production and soothing tight, dry skin. It even helps reduce the signs of aging

Repair Cell Damage: We added rich Manuka Honey to our Goat's Milk formula, which is known for its ability to promote skin repair on a cellular level! It opens and cleans pores while also supporting structural growth, resulting in firmer, more youthful-looking skin

Natural and Effective: Made in the USA and featuring a 100% vegetable base, our natural Goat's Milk soap will change the way you think about skin care! It's sulfate, paraben and cruelty free, contains natural ingredients, and certified by the Rainforest Alliance

Satisfaction Guarantee: Sunaroma is a family owned company dedicated to creating safe, natural skin care! We know this will be the best Goat's Milk soap you've tried, but if for any reason you're not happy with your order, return it with our money back guarantee
description: With Organic Shea Butter And Manuka Honey Softens And Conditions Skin, Paraben And Sulfate Free, 100% Vegetable Based
